name: daburu-mean-app-template
description: This is the template a MEAN app that includes a node.js API back-end and an Angular UI front-end.

scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run prepublishOnly:api && npm run prepublishOnly:ui
scripts.clean: npm run clean:api && npm run clean:ui
scripts.build: npm run build:api && npm run build:ui
scripts.rebuild: npm run rebuild:api && npm run rebuild:ui
scripts.nsp: npm run nsp:api && npm run nsp:ui
scripts.test: npm run test:api && npm run test:ui
scripts.lint: npm run lint:api && npm run lint:ui
